appDescription: Exploring Egypt's treasures is like stepping back in time and experiencing the grandeur of this ancient civilization.
loginDescription: login into your account and continue your exciting journey.
resetPasswordDescription: Empower your journey back in with ease
confirmEmailDescription: Confirm your email now to start your journey with us.
forgetPasswordDescription: Forgot your password ? Recover access in just a few steps
signUpDescription: Create Account and unlock a world of possibilities
appIntroduction: Let the Treasures of Egypt application be your guide on this wonderful journey of discovery and enter the world of wonders and discover the greatness that has captivated the world for centuries.
discoverDescription: where nature 's wonders unfold in every corner. From pristine beaches that stretch as far as the eye can see, to majestic mountains that touch the sky, Egypt's governorates are a paradise for nature lovers.Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors of its diverse landscapes,where lush green forests,cascading waterfalls,and serene lakes create a picturesque setting.Explore charming towns and villages,each with its own unique charm and rich cultural heritage.Indulge in delicious local cuisine,meet friendly locals,and experience the warm hospitality that Egypt 's governorates are renowned for. Whether you seek adventure, relaxation, or a soul-enriching journey, Egypt's governorates offer an unforgettable experience that will leave you mesmerized.
languageChanged: The application currently supports the English language.
passwordsNotMatch: Password Not Match with Confirm Password
passwordNotSatisfy: The password does not meet the required conditions of uppercase and lowercase letters, special characters, numbers and not less than 8 characters.
doYouWantToDeleteYourAccount: Before you hit delete, pause and ponder the memories and experiences tied to your account. Each click, each interaction is a thread weaving your digital story. Save your moments, retain your network, and preserve the essence of your online journey. Embark on an immersive journey through the sands of time with our app dedicated to Egypt's mesmerizing treasures. Unveil the secrets of pharaohs, pyramids, and ancient wonders as you explore a virtual trove of history and mystique. Dive into a world where each artifact whispers tales of a legendary civilization lost in time. Discover the allure of Egypt's treasures at your fingertips.
